name: Frosty Feline Photo Op
description:
Oh No! We need to raise money to fix the heating at our cat shelter.

But we've devised a plan: sell cute cat photos to raise money! Dress the cats in winter clothes to keep them warm and make them look even cuter to potential donors.
Keep in mind, some days are colder than others, and sometimes cat preferences will change. They may wear a hat one day, but not the next!

How quickly can you raise enough funds?
